parameters.name: PaperSz
parameters.description: Paper size as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Templ
parameters.description: Template as defined in swDwgTemplates_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: FirstAngle
parameters.description: True if you want first angle projection, false if not

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Custom paper width if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPaperUserDefined (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Custom paper height if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPaperUserDefined (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SameCustomPropAsSheetInDocProp
parameters.description: True to select the Same as sheet specified in Document Properties check box in the Sheet Properties dialog, false to not (see Remarks )

title: ISheet.SetProperties2
description: Sets the properties for this sheet.
signature:
void SetProperties2( 
   System.Int32
PaperSz
,
   System.Int32
Templ
,
   System.Double
Scale1
,
   System.Double
Scale2
,
   System.Boolean
FirstAngle
,
   System.Double
Width
,
   System.Double
Height
,
   System.Boolean
SameCustomPropAsSheetInDocProp
)

parameters.name: PaperSz
parameters.description: Paper size as defined in swDwgPaperSizes_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Templ
parameters.description: Template as defined in swDwgTemplates_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: FirstAngle
parameters.description: True if you want first angle projection, false if not

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: Custom paper width if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPaperUserDefined (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Custom paper height if PaperSz = swDwgPaperSizes_e.swDwgPaperUserDefined (see Remarks )

parameters.name: SameCustomPropAsSheetInDocProp
parameters.description: True to select the Same as sheet specified in Document Properties check box in the Sheet Properties dialog, false to not (see Remarks )

remarks:
If you...
Then...
Specify a custom template
The current custom template is used by this sheet until you call
ISheet::SetTemplateName
and pass in a different custom template name.
Specify a value for Templ that does not match PaperSz
The template does not fit the paper size. Templ does not override the PaperSz setting.
Change the scale of the sheet using Scale1 and Scale2
Any drawing view that is set to use the sheet's scale takes the new scale setting.
Set SameCustomPropAsSheetInDocProp to true
The
Tools > Options > Document Properties > Drawing Sheets > Use custom property values from the sheet
check box must be preselected.
NOTE:
You can also use
ISheet::SetSize
to set the size of the sheet and the standard sheet size.
